name: Dan!
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: May this year bring you endless joy, incredible adventures, and success in all your endeavors
textInChatBox: Happy happy birthday to you! I wish you all the best..
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
